sourcesContent:
// client/src/pages/Home.js

import React from 'react';
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom'; // Use RouterLink to avoid conflict
import {
  Box,
  Heading,
  Text,
  Button,
  VStack,
  HStack,
  Container,
  Image,
  Flex,
  SimpleGrid,
  Icon, // To use lucide-react icons more flexibly
  useBreakpointValue // For responsive values
} from '@chakra-ui/react';

// Import Lucide Icons directly
import { Search, Star, Users, BookOpen, Trophy, ArrowRight, Sparkles, Target, Zap, Shield } from 'lucide-react';

const Home = () => {
  // Data for sections (keeping your existing data structure, but will use fewer fields)
  const subjectAreas = [
    { name: 'Mathematics', icon: 'üìä', color: 'blue.500', students: '2.3k+', tutors: '450+' },
    { name: 'Science', icon: 'üß¨', color: 'green.500', students: '1.8k+', tutors: '320+' },
    { name: 'Languages', icon: 'üåç', color: 'purple.500', students: '3.1k+', tutors: '580+' },
    { name: 'Humanities', icon: 'üìú', color: 'orange.500', students: '1.5k+', tutors: '290+' },
    { name: 'Test Prep', icon: 'üéØ', color: 'red.500', students: '2.7k+', tutors: '410+' },
    { name: 'Arts', icon: 'üé®', color: 'teal.500', students: '1.2k+', tutors: '180+' }
  ];

  const features = [
    {
      icon: <Icon as={Target} w={7} h={7} />, // Use Chakra's Icon component
      title: 'AI-Powered Matching',
      desc: 'Advanced algorithm finds your perfect tutor based on learning style, goals, and preferences',
      color: 'purple.500' // Use Chakra color token
    },
    {
      icon: <Icon as={Zap} w={7} h={7} />,
      title: 'Instant Booking',
      desc: 'Schedule sessions in seconds with real-time availability and flexible timing options',
      color: 'blue.500'
    },
    {
      icon: <Icon as={Shield} w={7} h={7} />,
      title: 'Verified Experts',
      desc: 'All tutors undergo rigorous background checks, certification, and skill assessments',
      color: 'green.500'
    },
    {
      icon: <Icon as={Star} w={7} h={7} />,
      title: '5-Star Experience',
      desc: 'Consistently rated excellent by 98% of students with personalized learning paths',
      color: 'yellow.500'
    }
  ];

  const stats = [
    { number: '15K+', label: 'Active Students', icon: <Icon as={Users} w={6} h={6} /> },
    { number: '3K+', label: 'Expert Tutors', icon: <Icon as={BookOpen} w={6} h={6} /> },
    { number: '250K+', label: 'Sessions Completed', icon: <Icon as={Trophy} w={6} h={6} /> },
    { number: '4.9', label: 'Average Rating', icon: <Icon as={Star} w={6} h={6} /> }
  ];

  const testimonials = [
    {
      name: "Sarah Johnson",
      role: "High School Student",
      image: "SJ",
      content: "TutorMatch transformed my calculus grades from C's to A's! The personalized approach and instant feedback helped me understand complex concepts that seemed impossible before.",
      rating: 5,
      subject: "Mathematics",
      improvement: "+2 Grade Levels"
    },
    {
      name: "James Wilson",
      role: "Parent of Maria",
      image: "JW",
      content: "Finding a quality Spanish tutor was challenging until we discovered TutorMatch. Maria's confidence and fluency have skyrocketed in just 3 months!",
      rating: 5,
      subject: "Spanish",
      improvement: "98% Session Attendance"
    },
    {
      name: "Dr. Michael Chen",
      role: "Computer Science Tutor",
      image: "MC",
      content: "The platform's matching system is incredible. I'm paired with students who genuinely benefit from my teaching style, making every session rewarding and effective.",
      rating: 5,
      subject: "Computer Science",
      improvement: "500+ Hours Taught"
    }
  ];

  const howItWorks = [
    {
      step: "01",
      title: "Search & Filter",
      desc: "Use our smart filters to find tutors by subject, experience level, availability, and teaching style preference.",
      icon: <Icon as={Search} w={8} h={8} />,
      color: "purple.500"
    },
    {
      step: "02",
      title: "Connect & Book",
      desc: "Browse detailed profiles, read reviews, and book your first session with instant confirmation and calendar sync.",
      icon: <Icon as={Users} w={8} h={8} />,
      color: "blue.500"
    },
    {
      step: "03",
      title: "Learn & Grow",
      desc: "Attend personalized sessions, track your progress with detailed analytics, and achieve your learning goals faster.",
      icon: <Icon as={Trophy} w={8} h={8} />,
      color: "green.500"
    }
  ];

  // Helper for responsive font sizes (example for hero heading)
  const heroHeadingSize = useBreakpointValue({ base: "2xl", md: "4xl", lg: "5xl" });
  const heroTextSize = useBreakpointValue({ base: "md", md: "lg" });

  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Flex
        minH={{ base: "auto", md: "80vh" }}
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
        py={{ base: 10, md: 20 }}
        px={{ base: 4, md: 8 }}
        bgGradient="linear(to-br, brand.600, brand.800)" // Darker gradient from your brand colors
        direction={{ base: "column", md: "row" }}
        color="white"
      >
        <VStack spacing={6} textAlign={{ base: "center", md: "left" }} alignItems={{ base: "center", md: "flex-start" }} maxW="xl">
          <HStack
            bg="whiteAlpha.200"
            backdropFilter="blur(5px)"
            borderRadius="full"
            px={4}
            py={2}
            spacing={2}
          >
            <Icon as={Sparkles} w={5} h={5} color="yellow.300" />
            <Text fontSize="sm" fontWeight="semibold" color="blue.100">Trusted by 15,000+ students worldwide</Text>
          </HStack>

          <Heading as="h1" size={heroHeadingSize} lineHeight="shorter">
            Find Your{' '}
            <Text as="span" bgGradient="linear(to-r, yellow.300, orange.400)" bgClip="text">
              Perfect Tutor
            </Text>
          </Heading>
          <Text fontSize={heroTextSize} color="blue.100" maxW="lg">
            Connect with world-class tutors and unlock your full potential with personalized, AI-matched learning experiences.
          </Text>

          <HStack spacing={4} mt={6}>
            <Button
              as={RouterLink}
              to="/search"
              colorScheme="yellow" // Using a standard Chakra color scheme for contrast
              size="lg"
              px={8}
              rounded="full"
              shadow="md"
              _hover={{ shadow: "lg", transform: "translateY(-2px)" }}
            >
              <Icon as={Search} mr={2} />
              Find a Tutor
            </Button>

            <Button
              as={RouterLink}
              to="/apply"
              variant="outline"
              colorScheme="whiteAlpha"
              size="lg"
              px={8}
              rounded="full"
              shadow="md"
              _hover={{ bg: "whiteAlpha.200", transform: "translateY(-2px)" }}
            >
              <Icon as={Users} mr={2} />
              Become a Tutor
            </Button>
          </HStack>
        </VStack>
        <Box mt={{ base: 8, md: 0 }} ml={{ md: 10 }} maxW={{ base: "sm", md: "md" }}>
          {/* Replace with your actual hero image path */}
          <Image
            src="https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/4299E1/FFFFFF?text=Hero+Image"
            alt="Students learning with a tutor"
            rounded="lg"
            shadow="xl"
            fallbackSrc="https://via.placeholder.com/400x300?text=Loading..."
          />
        </Box>
      </Flex>

      {/* Stats Section */}
      <Container maxW="container.xl" py={12}>
        <SimpleGrid columns={{ base: 2, md: 4 }} spacing={8}>
          {stats.map((stat, index) => (
            <VStack key={index} p={4} bg="white" rounded="lg" shadow="sm" align="center" textAlign="center">
              <Icon as={stat.icon.type} w={stat.icon.props.w} h={stat.icon.props.h} color="brand.500" mb={2} /> {/* Accessing icon type */}
              <Text fontSize={{ base: "2xl", md: "3xl" }} fontWeight="black" color="gray.800">{stat.number}</Text>
              <Text fontSize="sm" color="gray.600">{stat.label}</Text>
            </VStack>
          ))}
        </SimpleGrid>
      </Container>

      {/* Features Section */}
      <Box bg="gray.50" py={20}>
        <Container maxW="container.lg">
          <VStack spacing={4} textAlign="center" mb={12}>
            <Text
              fontSize="sm"
              fontWeight="bold"
              bgGradient="linear(to-r, purple.600, blue.600)"
              bgClip="text"
              textTransform="uppercase"
            >
              Why Choose TutorMatch?
            </Text>
            <Heading as="h2" size="xl">
              Revolutionary{' '}
              <Text as="span" bgGradient="linear(to-r, blue.600, purple.600)" bgClip="text">
                Learning Platform
              </Text>
            </Heading>
            <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.600" maxW="3xl">
              We've transformed online tutoring with cutting-edge AI technology and a curated network of exceptional educators.
            </Text>
          </VStack>

          <SimpleGrid columns={{ base: 1, md: 2, lg: 4 }} spacing={8}>
            {features.map((feature, index) => (
              <VStack
                key={index}
                p={6}
                bg="white"
                rounded="xl"
                shadow="md"
                borderWidth="1px"
                borderColor="gray.100"
                spacing={4}
                align="flex-start"
                _hover={{ shadow: "xl", transform: "translateY(-5px)" }}
                transition="all 0.3s ease-in-out"
              >
                <Flex
                  w={16}
                  h={16}
                  bgGradient={`linear(to-r, ${feature.color}, ${feature.color}.700)`} // Example gradient
                  rounded="xl"
                  align="center"
                  justify="center"
                  color="white"
                  shadow="lg"
                >
                  {feature.icon}
                </Flex>
                <Heading as="h3" size="md">{feature.title}</Heading>
                <Text color="gray.600">{feature.desc}</Text>
              </VStack>
            ))}
          </SimpleGrid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* How It Works Section */}
      <Box bg="brand.50" py={20}>
        <Container maxW="container.lg">
          <VStack spacing={4} textAlign="center" mb={12}>
            <Heading as="h2" size="xl">How It Works</Heading>
            <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.600" maxW="2xl">
              Three simple steps to transform your learning experience
            </Text>
          </VStack>

          <SimpleGrid columns={{ base: 1, md: 3 }} spacing={8}>
            {howItWorks.map((item, index) => (
              <VStack
                key={index}
                p={8}
                bg="white"
                rounded="xl"
                shadow="md"
                borderWidth="1px"
                borderColor="gray.100"
                spacing={4}
                align="flex-start"
                _hover={{ shadow: "xl", transform: "translateY(-5px)" }}
                transition="all 0.3s ease-in-out"
                position="relative" // For connecting lines if you add them later
              >
                <Flex
                  w={16}
                  h={16}
                  bgGradient={`linear(to-r, ${item.color}, ${item.color}.700)`}
                  rounded="xl"
                  align="center"
                  justify="center"
                  color="white"
                  shadow="lg"
                >
                  {item.icon}
                </Flex>
                <Text fontSize="5xl" fontWeight="black" color="gray.100" position="absolute" top={4} right={4}>{item.step}</Text>
                <Heading as="h3" size="lg" mt={2}>{item.title}</Heading>
                <Text color="gray.600">{item.desc}</Text>
              </VStack>
            ))}
          </SimpleGrid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Subject Areas Section */}
      <Box bg="white" py={20}>
        <Container maxW="container.lg">
          <VStack spacing={4} textAlign="center" mb={12}>
            <Heading as="h2" size="xl">Explore Subject Areas</Heading>
            <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.600" maxW="2xl">
              Expert tutors across every field of study
            </Text>
          </VStack>

          <SimpleGrid columns={{ base: 1, md: 2, lg: 3 }} spacing={6}>
            {subjectAreas.map((subject, index) => (
              <Box
                key={index}
                as={RouterLink} // Make the entire box a link
                to={`/search?subject=${subject.name}`}
                p={8}
                bg="white"
                borderWidth="1px"
                borderColor="gray.200"
                rounded="xl"
                shadow="md"
                _hover={{ shadow: "xl", transform: "translateY(-5px)", borderColor: "brand.300" }}
                transition="all 0.3s ease-in-out"
              >
                <Flex
                  w={16}
                  h={16}
                  bg={subject.color} // Use plain color for background
                  rounded="lg"
                  align="center"
                  justify="center"
                  fontSize="4xl" // For emoji icons
                  mb={4}
                >
                  {subject.icon}
                </Flex>
                <Heading as="h3" size="lg" mb={3}>{subject.name}</Heading>
                <VStack spacing={1} align="flex-start" mb={4}>
                  <HStack justifyContent="space-between" width="full">
                    <Text fontSize="md" color="gray.600">Active Students:</Text>
                    <Text fontSize="md" fontWeight="bold" color="gray.800">{subject.students}</Text>
                  </HStack>
                  <HStack justifyContent="space-between" width="full">
                    <Text fontSize="md" color="gray.600">Available Tutors:</Text>
                    <Text fontSize="md" fontWeight="bold" color="gray.800">{subject.tutors}</Text>
                  </HStack>
                </VStack>
                <Text color="brand.500" fontWeight="semibold" display="flex" alignItems="center">
                  Explore Tutors <Icon as={ArrowRight} ml={2} />
                </Text>
              </Box>
            ))}
          </SimpleGrid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Testimonials Section */}
      <Box bg="brand.50" py={20}>
        <Container maxW="container.lg">
          <VStack spacing={4} textAlign="center" mb={12}>
            <Heading as="h2" size="xl">Success Stories</Heading>
            <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.600" maxW="2xl">
              Real results from our thriving learning community
            </Text>
          </VStack>

          <SimpleGrid columns={{ base: 1, md: 3 }} spacing={8}>
            {testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
              <Box
                key={index}
                p={8}
                bg="white"
                rounded="xl"
                shadow="md"
                borderWidth="1px"
                borderColor="gray.100"
                _hover={{ shadow: "xl", transform: "translateY(-5px)" }}
                transition="all 0.3s ease-in-out"
              >
                <Flex alignItems="center" mb={6}>
                  <Flex
                    w={16}
                    h={16}
                    bg="brand.500" // A solid color for testimonial avatar placeholder
                    rounded="full"
                    align="center"
                    justify="center"
                    color="white"
                    fontSize="xl"
                    fontWeight="bold"
                    mr={4}
                  >
                    {testimonial.image}
                  </Flex>
                  <VStack align="flex-start" spacing={0}>
                    <Heading as="h4" size="md">{testimonial.name}</Heading>
                    <Text fontSize="sm" color="gray.600">{testimonial.role}</Text>
                    <HStack mt={1} spacing={2}>
                      <Text as="span" bg="blue.100" color="blue.700" px={2} py={1} rounded="full" fontSize="xs" fontWeight="medium">{testimonial.subject}</Text>
                      <Text as="span" bg="green.100" color="green.700" px={2} py={1} rounded="full" fontSize="xs" fontWeight="medium">{testimonial.improvement}</Text>
                    </HStack>
                  </VStack>
                </Flex>

                <HStack spacing={1} mb={4}>
                  {Array.from({ length: testimonial.rating }).map((_, i) => (
                    <Icon key={i} as={Star} w={5} h={5} color="yellow.400" fill="yellow.400" />
                  ))}
                </HStack>

                <Text fontStyle="italic" color="gray.700">"{testimonial.content}"</Text>
              </Box>
            ))}
          </SimpleGrid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* CTA Section */}
      <Flex
        minH="400px"
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
        py={20}
        px={{ base: 4, md: 8 }}
        bgGradient="linear(to-br, brand.700, brand.900)" // Darker gradient for CTA
        color="white"
        textAlign="center"
      >
        <VStack spacing={6} maxW="4xl">
          <Heading as="h2" size="xl" lineHeight="shorter">
            Ready to Transform Your{' '}
            <Text as="span" bgGradient="linear(to-r, yellow.300, orange.400)" bgClip="text">
              Learning Journey?
            </Text>
          </Heading>
          <Text fontSize="lg" color="blue.100">
            Join thousands of successful learners and start your personalized education experience today.
          </Text>

          <HStack spacing={4} mt={6} wrap="wrap" justifyContent="center">
            <Button
              as={RouterLink}
              to="/register"
              colorScheme="yellow" // Using standard Chakra color
              size="lg"
              px={10}
              py={3}
              rounded="full"
              shadow="md"
              _hover={{ shadow: "lg", transform: "translateY(-2px)" }}
            >
              Get Started Free
              <Icon as={ArrowRight} ml={2} />
            </Button>

            <Button
              as={RouterLink}
              to="/search" // Changed from /watch-demo to /search, as you don't have a demo page
              variant="outline"
              colorScheme="whiteAlpha"
              size="lg"
              px={10}
              py={3}
              rounded="full"
              shadow="md"
              _hover={{ bg: "whiteAlpha.200", transform: "translateY(-2px)" }}
            >
              <Icon as={Search} mr={2} /> {/* Changed icon from Play to Search */}
              Find Tutors Now
            </Button>
          </HStack>
        </VStack>
      </Flex>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
